title: Cinderella Penguin, or, The Little Glass Flipper
description: All cultures share the traditional story of Cinderella--even penguin culture!Poor Cinderella Penguin is bossed and bullied by her evil penguin stepsisters as they get dolled up for the Penguin Prince's ball. After they have gone, a penguin tear rolls down Cinderella's cheek. "Suddenly, in a glow of bright blue light, the Great Fairy Penguin appeared before her." And the rest is penguin history."A Children's Choice Award winner"Lots of fun."-- Booklist
author: Janet Perlman
